name: FlutterFly
description:
FlutterFly is a butterfly trying to cross the forest where you pass hoops.
We used to dream of what it must be like to grow wings, to feel the depth of that potential, if you can’t fly high fly free FlutterFly is under the control of gravity and uses your quick reflexes and controls.

Help this butterfly pass the hoops by touching the screen.

FEATURES
★ One tap mechanics
★ Offline game and free to play!
★ Easy to grasp controls
★ Simple and addictive gameplay
★ Calm and relaxing music and sounds
★ Different High-Flying Jumps and Dunks
★ Great hopping experience
★ Stunning 2D Visual effects and animations
★ Google Play Games support!

Enjoy this flying butterfly adventure!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/starsurgegames/
Website: https://www.starsurge.in/
